data.text: @katiedesign Hi Katie, sorry to hear of the delay on your flight but we hope you will enjoy your holidays. Regards - Lee
@YouEvenTrying and if you repeatedly don’t adhere, we may ban you from posting to our page. Thanks - Leslie 2/2

@Anniieee22 Hey Anna, could you please DM us your booking reference and your nominated email address, we can resend it for you. Thanks -J
@lepotzing damage. Oversized item fee may apply if it's one side is longer than 1 metre. 2/2
@lepotzing Hi, we allow TVs as part of your checked baggage. However, since this item is fragile, we don't accept any liability for 1/2
@nickp280888 I'll be happy to resend your itinerary for you. Thanks - Camille 2/2

@masiaone Sorry to hear this. Could you please DM us what's gone wrong along with your booking reference? We'll see how we can assist. -Jan
@saintinc - We offer a range of payment options online. Some options do incur a fee, however this is communicated during booking a flight.
@Fennieeeee_ Sorry to hear this. Please DM us your booking reference so we can take a look and see on how we're able to assist. Thanks - Lee
@thomasjoulin - Thanks for the feedback, if you sign up to My Jetstar you can manage your email preferences with us. https://t.co/qGNX4LBHkq
@TomDG Hey, thanks for sharing! We hope you enjoyed your flight. :) Cheers - Lee
@BebeVoyage Hey there! I have replied to your DM. Thanks! - Camille

data.text: @tentstents Hey, nice photo. Thanks for sharing! We hope to see you back on-board soon. Regards - Lee

@FrequentFlyer80 Sorry to hear you missed the flight, but hope you were able to get on your way ASAP - Em
@rfajriani_ I'm very sorry to hear this. Have you contacted our baggage services team here: https://t.co/k2aJbRiqhc - Emma
@JJSinghSTARR Hi JJ, sorry to hear this. We always aim to get every flight on time, but safety comes 1st and delays can be unavoidable - Em
@ndrewrc Hey Andy, Sorry you're disappointed with our response. Feel free to DM us if you have further comments. Thanks - Em
@ndrewrc always possible due to operational requirements and our safety standards. I apologise for any inconvenience this meant for you. 2/2
@ndrewrc I'm sorry to hear that you experienced some delays. We try to ensure all flights get away on time but I’m afraid that it’s not 1/2
@rash594 I have now responded to your DM. Kindly check your inbox. Thanks- Jan
@traveltotsca Thanks for the shoutout! I hope you have enjoyed your flight with us. :) Thanks- Jan

@SmallTownBoyMS 3/3 day to day role. It would be impractical for us to expect them to weigh and measure every piece of baggage all flights.J
@SmallTownBoyMS 2/3 While we would always want our staff to be consistent, checking cabin baggage is generally a very small part of their
@SmallTownBoyMS 1/3 Sorry to hear that you were frustrated with the service provided by our staff on the day and we appreciate your feedback
@SmallTownBoyMS to check in your baggage allowance on the day. You can see more info about baggage at https://t.co/Xb7nxGcLyy. - Leslie 4/4
@SmallTownBoyMS We do apologise if you felt you were singled out or if staff didn’t clearly explain why you were charged 3/4
@SmallTownBoyMS There is also a limit on the number of items you can bring and the size of your carry-on baggage. 2/4
@SmallTownBoyMS Hi! Sorry to hear this. There are strict weight limits to how much you can bring on board. 1/4
@MusangHitam Hey, I've responded on your other tweet. Thanks -J
